title: And Just Like That, Organized
description:
And just like that, Jessica is back in the U-S-of-A and we are digging into the joy, the pain, and the embarrassment of home organization. Then, we could not let this episode go by without talking about the Sex and The City reboot, June proclaims her alignment with a surprising character, and the gals discuss who is in fact ‘getting the parts’. Deep Divers, we asked to see your Christmas Trees and now we want to see ALL your holiday decorations.


 

Visit https://www.lifeinjeneral.com/ for all your home organization needs

Follow them on instagram @lifeinjeneral

Visit the Pinterest Board pinterest.com/thedeepdive

You can follow The Deep Dive on Twitter @thedeepdivepod

June Diane Raphael @MsJuneDiane on Twitter @junediane on Instagram

Jessica St. Clair @Jessica_StClair on Twitter @stclairjessica on Instagram

Check out the Jane Club at www.janeclub.com

Send us your The Deep Dive theme or any questions you might have to thedeepdive@earwolf.com
author: thedeepdive@earwolf.com (Earwolf)
